bike.description: All-New DEMO 8 FSR frame.  Super low center of gravity and standover with sub-seatstay actuated shock.  Full cartridge bearing pivots, 8.1� of travel with full chainguide and front derailleur compatibility.  135mm wide symmetrical 6mm offset rear triangle, ISCG mount, rear derailleur protector. 26 and 24� wheel compatible with two geometry settings, 16.7� chainstay length, forged and CNC�d  OS HT, Super ORE TT/DT.
